# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(str)
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = ""
        end
        current_line = isempty(current_line) ? word : current_line * " " * word
    end
    
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    
    return join(lines, '\n')
end

str = "This function will wrap words into lines"
println(wrap_string(str))
```
